alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 12:43AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Webb County through 130 AM CDT... At 1243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Chupadera Ranch Airport to 18 miles west of Las Tiendas to 17 miles northwest of Columbia Bridge. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Las Tiendas, Columbia Bridge and La Esperanza Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 680. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
